product_name: KALANDO Wireless Bluetooth Colorful LED Water Speaker with Dancing Fountain Light Show Sound for PC, MP3 Player, Laptops, Smartphone Black
explanation: The total CO2e emissions for the KALANDO Wireless Bluetooth Colorful LED Water Speaker are calculated as follows: 1. Material extraction and processing contribute significantly due to the high energy-intensive production of ABS plastic (60%) and electronic components (25%). Assuming an average emission factor of 2.5 kg CO2e per kg of material, this results in 2.25 kg CO2e. 2. Manufacturing emissions are directly given as 3.5 kg CO2e. 3. Transportation and distribution are estimated at 0.2 kg CO2e based on average transportation distances and modes. 4. End-of-life disposal is estimated at 0.3 kg CO2e, considering recycling and waste management practices. The total CO2e emissions are the sum of these components, following GHG Protocol Product Standard, ISO 14040/14044, PAS 2050, and ISO/TS 14067 guidelines.

product_name: Diamond ATI Radeon HD5870 Eyefinity 6 Edition 2048 MB GDDR5 PCI-Express Video Card 5870PE52G
explanation: The total CO2e emissions for the Diamond ATI Radeon HD5870 Eyefinity 6 Edition 2048 MB GDDR5 PCI-Express Video Card are calculated as follows: 1. Material extraction and processing (Scope 3 upstream): Estimated based on material percentages and respective emission factors. 2. Manufacturing emissions (Scope 1 & 2): 15.3 kg CO2e as provided. 3. Transportation and distribution (Scope 3 upstream & downstream): Assumed to be 2 kg CO2e based on average transportation emissions for electronics. 4. End-of-life disposal (Scope 3 downstream): Assumed to be 0.25 kg CO2e based on typical e-waste disposal emissions. The calculations follow GHG Protocol Product Standard, ISO 14040/14044, PAS 2050, and ISO/TS 14067 guidelines.

product_name: Case for iPad Pro 12.9 2022/2021/2020/2018, Blue Flowers Shockproof Protective Case for iPad Pro 12.9 6th/5th/4th/3rd Gen, [Auto Sleep/Wake] [with Pencil Holder] Adjustable Stand iPad Case Folio Cover
explanation: The total CO2e emissions for this iPad Pro case are calculated as follows: 1. Material extraction and processing: Polyurethane (PU) Leather (50% of the product) and Thermoplastic Polyurethane (TPU) (30%) are petroleum-based, contributing significantly to emissions. Microfiber (20%) has a lower impact. Assuming average emission factors for these materials, the upstream emissions are estimated. 2. Manufacturing emissions: The manufacturing process emits 2.5 kg CO2e per kg of product. 3. Transportation and distribution: Assuming average transportation distances and modes, emissions are estimated using standard emission factors. 4. End-of-life disposal: Assuming landfill disposal with average emission factors for waste management. The total CO2e emissions are calculated by summing these contributions, following GHG Protocol Product Standard, ISO 14040/14044, PAS 2050, and ISO/TS 14067 guidelines.

product_name: Lenovo Thinkpad T440S 14" FHD Touchscreen Ultrabook Laptop Computer, Intel Core i5-4200U up to 2.6GHz, 8GB RAM, 240GB SSD, WiFi, Bluetooth, USB 3.0, Windows 10 Professional (Renewed)
explanation: The total CO2e emissions for the Lenovo Thinkpad T440S are calculated as follows: 1. Material extraction and processing: Plastics (40% of product, 1.25 kg CO2e/kg), Metals (30%, 2.5 kg CO2e/kg), Electronics (20%, 5 kg CO2e/kg), Glass (5%, 1 kg CO2e/kg), Battery (3%, 10 kg CO2e/kg), Rubber (1%, 0.5 kg CO2e/kg), Other (1%, 0.5 kg CO2e/kg). 2. Manufacturing emissions: 12.5 kg CO2e. 3. Transportation and distribution: Assumed 1 kg CO2e for upstream and 1 kg CO2e for downstream. 4. End-of-life disposal: Assumed 0.25 kg CO2e. Emission factors and assumptions are based on GHG Protocol Product Standard, ISO 14040/14044, PAS 2050, and ISO/TS 14067 guidelines.

product_name: Ceeyali Reusable Hook and Loop Fastening Cable Ties Cable Straps for Home Office Tablet PC TV Electronics Wires Organizer Management (15 Pack 8 inch + 15 Pack 12 inch)
explanation: The total CO2e emissions for the Ceeyali Reusable Hook and Loop Fastening Cable Ties are calculated as follows: 1.5 kg CO2e from manufacturing (Scope 1 & 2). Assuming typical emission factors for polyester fabric production and transportation, an additional 0.65 kg CO2e is estimated for material extraction and processing (Scope 3 upstream). Transportation and distribution contribute approximately 0.05 kg CO2e (Scope 3 upstream & downstream). End-of-life disposal is assumed to be negligible due to the product's reusable nature and potential for recycling. The calculations follow the GHG Protocol Product Standard, ISO 14040/14044, PAS 2050, and ISO/TS 14067 guidelines, ensuring a comprehensive life cycle assessment.

product_name: HYS 3.5mm Police Listen Only Acoustic Tube Earpiece with One Pair Medium Earmolds for Speaker Mics
explanation: The total CO2e emissions for the HYS 3.5mm Police Listen Only Acoustic Tube Earpiece are calculated as follows: 1) Material extraction and processing: Silicon (60% of product, 0.6 kg) with an emission factor of 2.5 kg CO2e/kg, Plastic (30%, 0.3 kg) with 2.0 kg CO2e/kg, Metal (5%, 0.05 kg) with 5.0 kg CO2e/kg, Rubber (5%, 0.05 kg) with 2.0 kg CO2e/kg. 2) Manufacturing emissions: 2.5 kg CO2e/kg as provided. 3) Transportation and distribution: Assuming an average emission factor of 0.1 kg CO2e/kg for transportation, resulting in 0.1 kg CO2e. 4) End-of-life disposal: Assuming an average emission factor of 0.1 kg CO2e/kg for disposal, resulting in 0.1 kg CO2e. Total CO2e emissions = (0.6 * 2.5) + (0.3 * 2.0) + (0.05 * 5.0) + (0.05 * 2.0) + 2.5 + 0.1 + 0.1 = 3.75 kg CO2e. Calculations follow GHG Protocol Product Standard, ISO 14040/14044, PAS 2050, and ISO/TS 14067 guidelines.

product_name: ASUS VivoBook Thin and Light Laptop, 15.6" HD Display, Intel Core i3-1005G1 Processor, USB Type-C, Webcam, Wi-Fi, HDMI, Windows 11 Home, Gray (12GB RAM | 256GB SSD)
explanation: The total CO2e emissions for the ASUS VivoBook laptop are calculated as follows: 125 kg from manufacturing (Scope 1 & 2), 30 kg from material extraction and processing (Scope 3 upstream), 20 kg from transportation and distribution (Scope 3 upstream & downstream), and 12.5 kg from end-of-life disposal (Scope 3 downstream). Emission factors and GWP values are derived from GHG Protocol Product Standard, ISO 14040/14044, PAS 2050, and ISO/TS 14067 guidelines. Assumptions include average emission factors for materials and processes, and standard transportation distances.

product_name: SMDV Diffuser-50 -- Professional 20x20" Rigid Softbox for Canon Flash
explanation: The total CO2e emissions for the SMDV Diffuser-50 are calculated as follows: Manufacturing emissions are 5.2 kg CO2e per kg of product. Assuming an average product weight of 2.65 kg, the manufacturing emissions are 13.83 kg CO2e. Material extraction and processing emissions are estimated based on the material composition: Ripstop Nylon (60% of 2.65 kg = 1.59 kg) with an emission factor of 6.5 kg CO2e/kg, Fiberglass (20% of 2.65 kg = 0.53 kg) with an emission factor of 1.5 kg CO2e/kg, Metal (15% of 2.65 kg = 0.3975 kg) with an emission factor of 2.5 kg CO2e/kg, and Silver Coating (5% of 2.65 kg = 0.1325 kg) with an emission factor of 10 kg CO2e/kg. Transportation and distribution emissions are estimated at 0.5 kg CO2e per kg of product, totaling 1.325 kg CO2e. End-of-life disposal emissions are estimated at 0.2 kg CO2e per kg of product, totaling 0.53 kg CO2e. Summing these values: 13.83 (manufacturing) + 10.335 (materials) + 1.325 (transportation) + 0.53 (disposal) = 26.02 kg CO2e. However, considering the product's lifespan and usage, an average of 40% of the total emissions are allocated to the product, resulting in 10.5 kg CO2e. This calculation follows GHG Protocol Product Standard, ISO 14040/14044, PAS 2050, and ISO/TS 14067 guidelines.

product_name: RasTech Raspberry Pi 3 Model B+ Starter Kit with 32GB Micro SD Card, Power Supply with ON/Off, Case, Micro SDHC Card, Cooling Fan, HDMI Cable, Network Cable, Hestsinks, Card Reader, Screwdriver
explanation: The total CO2e emissions for the RasTech Raspberry Pi 3 Model B+ Starter Kit are calculated as follows: 1) Material extraction and processing contribute significantly due to the energy-intensive nature of materials like plastic, copper, and silicon. Assuming an average emission factor of 2.5 kg CO2e per kg of material, the total is 12.5 kg CO2e. 2) Manufacturing emissions are directly given as 12.5 kg CO2e. 3) Transportation and distribution are estimated at 0.5 kg CO2e based on typical supply chain distances and modes. 4) End-of-life disposal is estimated at 0.25 kg CO2e, assuming standard recycling and disposal practices. The calculations follow GHG Protocol Product Standard, ISO 14040/14044, PAS 2050, and ISO/TS 14067 guidelines.

product_name: USB 3.0 Extension Cable 20Ft, TanGuYu USB 3.0 Extender Cord Type A Male to A Female for Oculus VR, Playstation, Xbox, USB Flash Drive, Card Reader, Hard Drive,Keyboard, Printer, Scanner, Camera
explanation: The total CO2e emissions for the USB 3.0 extension cable are calculated as follows: 1) Material extraction and processing: Tin-plated copper (30% of product, 1.5 kg CO2e/kg), Gold-plated connectors (5%, 1.2 kg CO2e/kg), Metal wire braid (20%, 1.0 kg CO2e/kg), PVC jacket (40%, 2.5 kg CO2e/kg), Foil shielding (5%, 0.8 kg CO2e/kg). 2) Manufacturing emissions: 2.5 kg CO2e. 3) Transportation and distribution: Assumed 0.2 kg CO2e based on average transportation emissions. 4) End-of-life disposal: Assumed 0.5 kg CO2e based on average disposal emissions. Calculations follow GHG Protocol Product Standard, ISO 14040/14044, PAS 2050, and ISO/TS 14067 guidelines.
